definition: While the green hills last, there'll be wood to burn (idiom). Where there's life there's hope.
pinyin: liu2 de5 qing1 shan1 zai4 , bu4 pa4 mei2 chai2 shao1
simplified: 留得青山在，不怕没柴烧
word: 留得青山在，不怕沒柴燒

definition: to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc

to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
